item.title: Build a Spotify Playlist Recommendation Model With R
item.description:
Author: Ed Orlando Recognition & Credit This article and its contents were heavily influenced by Matt Danchoâ€™s Learning Labs Pro Session #11. For more about Learning Labs Pro, please click here.
Problem & Solution Statements Many companies and products you interact with every day include some type of Recommendation system. For example, the Netflix app recommends movies based on your history and what is trending. Amazon lists recommended items based on your product purchase history or what you have recently viewed.
